it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.server.socket

Class SocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.server.socket.SocketHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler, java.lang.Runnable
    Server side of the Socket communication.

    Create and codify the command Strings that will be decoded by the Client Command Handler, that will call the appropriate view methods depending on their contents.

    See Also:
    CommandHandler

      • askName

        public java.lang.String askName(java.util.List<java.lang.String> names,
                                boolean reask)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Ask user to input name and returns to server side an "invalid code" if name is not valid
        Parameters:
        names - the names already present in the game
        reask - signals if it's the first time that ask the name
        Returns:
        the name String or an invalid code String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't reach the server side

        Ask to display the final results of the game
        Specified by:
        showFinalResults in interface Handler
        Parameters:
        iWon - signals is user won or not
        name - name of the user
        humanlosers - all the human players that have lost
        humanwinners - all the human players that have won
        alienwinners - all the alien players that have won
        alienlosers - all the alien players that have lost
